title: Management Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at NSSA (Norfolk, VA) in Sept 2012
Interview Descriptions: Very friendly and easy interview/hiring process.  I had an inside track with a past co-worker as part of the interview.  The two interviewers and I had similar backgrounds, the majority of the interview was telling stories and talking about mutual friends.  The hiring process was all via e-mail and once notified of my selection salary negation took place via e-mail and was quick and easy.
